SEARCH
Package oogasalad.editor.model.saver

Class EditorFileConverter

java.lang.Object
oogasalad.editor.model.saver.EditorFileConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
EditorFileConverterAPI
public class EditorFileConverter extends Object implements EditorFileConverterAPI
Implements the EditorFileConverterAPI to handle conversion of editor level data to and from files. This class is responsible for saving the editor's data to a file and loading data from a file into the editor. The methods currently have placeholder implementations and will need to be completed.
Author:
Jacob You

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    loadFileToEditor()
    Loads an existing file into the Editor by: 1) Calling GameFileParserAPI to parse the file into a standardized data structure 2) Translating that data structure into Editor-specific objects 3) Populating the Editor model with these objects
    void
    saveEditorDataToFile(EditorLevelData editorLevelData)
    Saves the current Editor scene to a file by: 1) Gathering Editor objects from the Editor's model 2) Converting them into a format recognized by GameFileParserAPI 3) Sending the write operation to GameFileParserAPI

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • saveEditorDataToFile

      public void saveEditorDataToFile(EditorLevelData editorLevelData) throws IOException, DataFormatException
      Description copied from interface: EditorFileConverterAPI
      Saves the current Editor scene to a file by: 1) Gathering Editor objects from the Editor's model 2) Converting them into a format recognized by GameFileParserAPI 3) Sending the write operation to GameFileParserAPI
      Specified by:
      saveEditorDataToFile in interface EditorFileConverterAPI
      Throws:
      IOException - if underlying file operations fail
      DataFormatException - if data cannot be translated into the parser's model

    • loadFileToEditor

      public void loadFileToEditor() throws IOException, DataFormatException
      Description copied from interface: EditorFileConverterAPI
      Loads an existing file into the Editor by: 1) Calling GameFileParserAPI to parse the file into a standardized data structure 2) Translating that data structure into Editor-specific objects 3) Populating the Editor model with these objects
      Specified by:
      loadFileToEditor in interface EditorFileConverterAPI
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file cannot be accessed
      DataFormatException - if the file's data cannot be parsed into valid Editor objects
